name: Untitled parkour shooter game
description:
Untitled parkour shooter game is a 3D game that combines parkour (platformer) and shooter. The current version is a prototype and the game elements will likely change and improve.

I'm am making this game with the goal of getting better at game-development and expand my skills. Comments and constructive criticism are welcome!

And, yes; while the game is currently a prototype, I want to finish it and release it as a full game.

Current game state: - Essential game mechanics: COMPLETE - Polishing before main game development: IN PROGRESS - Other game mechanics: IN PROGRESS - Main game development (level design, 'story'): / - Polishing after main game development: / - Bug fixing: IN PROGRESS Release date: UNKNOWN Additional notes: - Level design phase begins soon
